channel.title: RemotePC – News & Updates
channel.description: Release notes, roadmap updates, and development logs for the RemotePC Android app and Windows listener.

item.title: v0.3.0 — Encrypted chat & early file transfer
item.description: This version focuses on secure communication and local file transfer. Adds end-to-end encrypted chat between Android and Windows plus an early file transfer implementation.

item.title: Desktop alpha cleanup — tray, logging & exits
item.description: Quality-of-life improvements on the Windows listener: better tray behavior, clearer errors when ports are in use, and a crash on exit fixed.

item.title: Roadmap — Short-term plan for RemotePC
item.description: Short-term goals: smoother gestures, PIN-based pairing, better diagnostics, and clipboard sync between Android and Windows.
